content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. I'm here to help you schedule a plumbing, electrical, or HVAC service. May I start by getting your name, please?
Thanks, George! Could you please provide your service address so I can check if we're able to assist you in your area?
Sure, it’s 1234 Country Road, Maple Town.
Thank you, George. Let me verify whether that address is within our service area.
I’m sorry, George, but it appears that 1234 Country Road is outside of our service area. We wouldn’t be able to assist you there. Is there perhaps another address or location you’d like us to check?
No, that’s the only place. I don’t know what to do now. I really need some help with a plumbing leak.

I understand, George. While we can’t service your current address, I’d recommend contacting a local plumber in your area who can assist you right away. If you’d like, I can help you find someone nearby. Would you like some recommendations?
Yes, please. That would be great.
I will pass this along to one of our team members to help with recommendations for plumbers in the Maple Town area. Please wait a moment.
reason: Customer outside service area needing human help with local recommendations
